title: SET_WEATHER_TYPE_PERSIST
content:
0x704983DF373B198F0xC6C04C75// SetWeatherTypePersist
void SET_WEATHER_TYPE_PERSIST(char* weatherType);Parameters:weatherType: The weather type to be set as persistent. Refer to SET_WEATHER_TYPE_NOW for a list of weather type strings.Sets the current weather type to persist indefinitely until changed.Note: This native is not supported in networked sessions. Please refer to SET_OVERRIDE_WEATHER or SET_WEATHER_TYPE_NOW_PERSIST if you want to override weather in networked sessions.NativeDB Introduced: v323
